languages.text: "Так точно, Ваша Светлость. Иокаста Зауэрбэк, к вашим услугам. Мне доверена честь командовать блюстителями и следить за порядком на корабле. Мой долг — наказывать нарушителей, пресекать неповиновение и отражать нападения на судно".

"Indeed, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Jocasta Sauerback, at your service. I am entrusted with the honour of commanding the enforcers and keeping order aboard this vessel. It is my duty to punish trespassers, suppress disobedience, and repel any and all attacks on the ship."
languages.original_text: "Так точно, Ваша Светлость. Иокаста Зауэрбэк, к вашим услугам. Мне доверена честь командовать блюстителями и следить за порядком на корабле. Мой долг — наказывать нарушителей, пресекать неповиновение и отражать нападения на судно".

"Indeed, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Jocasta Sauerback, at your service. I am entrusted with the honour of commanding the enforcers and keeping order aboard this vessel. It is my duty to punish trespassers, suppress disobedience, and repel any and all attacks on the ship."

"Indeed, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Jocasta Sauerback, at your service. I am entrusted with the honour of commanding the enforcers and keeping order aboard this vessel. It is my duty to punish trespassers, suppress disobedience, and repel any and all attacks on the ship."

languages.text: «Así es, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Jocasta Sauerback, a su servicio. Se me ha confiado el honor de comandar a los guardias y mantener la seguridad y el orden en esta nave. Mi deber es castigar a los infractores, eliminar la desobediencia y rechazar todo ataque que sufra la nave».
languages.original_text: "Indeed, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Jocasta Sauerback, at your service. I am entrusted with the honour of commanding the enforcers and keeping order aboard this vessel. It is my duty to punish trespassers, suppress disobedience, and repel any and all attacks on the ship."

traits.locale_text: «Así es, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Jocasta Sauerback, a su servicio. Se me ha confiado el honor de comandar a los guardias y mantener la seguridad y el orden en esta nave. Mi deber es castigar a los infractores, eliminar la desobediencia y rechazar todo ataque que sufra la nave».

languages.text: 「そのとおりでございます、閣下。ジョカスタ・ザウアーバック、御前に参じました。私はこの船の秩序を守るべく、エンフォーサーの指揮を任されています。不法侵入者を罰し、不服従者を制圧し、船に対するあらゆる攻撃を撃退するのが私の役目でございます」
languages.original_text: "Indeed, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Jocasta Sauerback, at your service. I am entrusted with the honour of commanding the enforcers and keeping order aboard this vessel. It is my duty to punish trespassers, suppress disobedience, and repel any and all attacks on the ship."

traits.locale_text: 「そのとおりでございます、閣下。ジョカスタ・ザウアーバック、御前に参じました。私はこの船の秩序を守るべく、エンフォーサーの指揮を任されています。不法侵入者を罰し、不服従者を制圧し、船に対するあらゆる攻撃を撃退するのが私の役目でございます」

languages.text: “确实如此，大人。约卡斯塔·苏尔贝克，听候您的差遣。我有幸负责指挥船上所有执法者，维护舰船的秩序。我的职责是惩罚所有违纪的船员，镇压一切暴乱分子，击退任何胆敢袭击舰船的敌人。”
languages.original_text: "Indeed, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Jocasta Sauerback, at your service. I am entrusted with the honour of commanding the enforcers and keeping order aboard this vessel. It is my duty to punish trespassers, suppress disobedience, and repel any and all attacks on the ship."

traits.locale_text: “确实如此，大人。约卡斯塔·苏尔贝克，听候您的差遣。我有幸负责指挥船上所有执法者，维护舰船的秩序。我的职责是惩罚所有违纪的船员，镇压一切暴乱分子，击退任何胆敢袭击舰船的敌人。”

languages.text: "In der Tat, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Jocasta Sauerback, zu Euren Diensten. Mir obliegt die Ehre des Kommandos über die Enforcers sowie die Aufrechterhaltung der Ordnung an Bord dieses Schiffes. Es ist meine Pflicht, Eindringlinge zu bestrafen, Ungehorsam zu unterdrücken und jedwede Angriffe auf das Schiff zurückzuschlagen."
languages.original_text: "Indeed, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Jocasta Sauerback, at your service. I am entrusted with the honour of commanding the enforcers and keeping order aboard this vessel. It is my duty to punish trespassers, suppress disobedience, and repel any and all attacks on the ship."

traits.locale_text: "In der Tat, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Jocasta Sauerback, zu Euren Diensten. Mir obliegt die Ehre des Kommandos über die Enforcers sowie die Aufrechterhaltung der Ordnung an Bord dieses Schiffes. Es ist meine Pflicht, Eindringlinge zu bestrafen, Ungehorsam zu unterdrücken und jedwede Angriffe auf das Schiff zurückzuschlagen."

languages.text: « En effet, Votre Seigneurie. Jocasta Sauerback, pour vous servir. J'ai l'honneur de commander les prévôts et d'être en charge de faire régner l'ordre sur le vaisseau. Il est de mon devoir de punir les intrus, de réprimer toute forme de rébellion et de repousser les attaques. »
languages.original_text: "Indeed, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Jocasta Sauerback, at your service. I am entrusted with the honour of commanding the enforcers and keeping order aboard this vessel. It is my duty to punish trespassers, suppress disobedience, and repel any and all attacks on the ship."

traits.locale_text: « En effet, Votre Seigneurie. Jocasta Sauerback, pour vous servir. J'ai l'honneur de commander les prévôts et d'être en charge de faire régner l'ordre sur le vaisseau. Il est de mon devoir de punir les intrus, de réprimer toute forme de rébellion et de repousser les attaques. »

languages.text: "Evet, tanışmadık {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Jocasta Sauerback, hizmetinizdeyim. İnfazcılara komuta etme ve gemideki düzeni koruma şerefi bana emanet edildi. İzinsiz giriş yapanları cezalandırmak, itaatsizlikleri bastırmak ve gemideki tüm saldırıları püskürtmek benim vazifemdir."
languages.original_text: "Indeed, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Jocasta Sauerback, at your service. I am entrusted with the honour of commanding the enforcers and keeping order aboard this vessel. It is my duty to punish trespassers, suppress disobedience, and repel any and all attacks on the ship."
